team.name: Alyssa Lichtenstein
team.bioHtml: Designer with 10+ yrs experience & recent MBA grad. Previously worked as Print Product Development Manager.

jobs.title: Graphic Design Intern (Social Media Focus)
jobs.description: Opportunity for a design student or recent grad to gain experience in creating social media assets for small company.  Please note this position is unpaid.  We are looking for support to create content for our new Instagram and Pinterest accounts.  In addition, assets need to be created for Facebook and Twitter.  The role will involve using templates to create larger quantities of visual content.  This will include creation of carousels with information and sales messages.  There are opportunities to create additional templates, and design support from our business development officer, who has a background in design.  We have a mix of video and photographic content which can be used.  In addition, there are opportunities to create infographics.  The role will be work from home and will be supported virtually.
